players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked about Charlie's death. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I suggest we all share our thoughts on what happened and look for any suspicious behavior."
You: "I agree with Bob. Let's all be vigilant and share any concerns we may have. I don't have any specific suspicions at the moment, but I will keep a close eye on everyone's actions and words."
Diana: "Based on my investigation during the night, I have reason to believe that Bob is the mafioso. It would be in everyone's best interest if we could vote him out now to keep our village safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
